## Plane.SignedDistanceToPlaneFromPositionAndNormal() method

Calculates the distance from a plane and a point

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static SignedDistanceToPlaneFromPositionAndNormal(origin: Vector3, normal: Vector3, point: Vector3): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  origin | <code>Vector3</code> | origin of the plane to be constructed |
|  normal | <code>Vector3</code> | normal of the plane to be constructed |
|  point | <code>Vector3</code> | point to calculate distance to |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the signed distance between the plane defined by the normal vector at the "origin"" point and the given other point.
